definitions.definition: part; section; segment; portion (Classifier: 個／个 m)

parsedExamples.example: 水果的食用部分  ―  shuǐguǒ de shíyòng bùfen  ―  the edible part of a piece of fruit

parsedExamples.translation: Wǒ yǐjīng bǎ wénzhōng xūyào chóngxiě de bùfen biāoshì chūlái le. [Pinyin]

examples: 水果的食用部分  ―  shuǐguǒ de shíyòng bùfen  ―  the edible part of a piece of fruit
